title: American teens' health behaviors suffered a lot during pandemic - Axios
content:
1. American teens' health behaviors suffered a lot during pandemic  Axios
  2. CDC releases new data on COVID-19 pandemic impact on teens' mental health  WTHR
  3. Many Teens Report Emotional and Physical Abuse by Parents During Lockdown  The New York Times
  4. Pandemic took a toll on teen mental health, US study says  KING 5
  5. Analysis | Kids' mental health is getting worse. But that predated the pandemic.  The Washington Post
description: From increased drug and alcohol use to increased experiences of abuse and suicidality, the pandemic wreaked some major havoc on the health of American teenagers, according to a CDC report released Thursday.
